sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yue shui bu tiao 月水不調 . Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 4: 小五石澤蘭丸，治婦 人勞冷虛損，飲食減少，面無光色，腹中冷痛，經候不調 , “The small pills with the five mineral substances and ze lan cure women suffering from exhaustion cold and depletion harm. They drink and eat little. Their facial complexion has lost its glossiness. They feel cold and pain in their abdomen, and they experience menstrual irregularity ”.
